short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple chrome extension that converts pdfs to images and images to pdfs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An application that allows you to upload a pdf, convert it to an image and download, and vice versa. Simple and intuitive, it doesn't have any barrier of entry and can be easily used. Changes Jpg to pdf, pdf to jpg, png to pdf, pdf to png, and many other image extensions.
